channel.title: Games on Ziggurat
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Ziggurat

item.title: Retro Games on Modern Platforms
item.description: Here’s a not-at-all-complete list of recent projects great developers from the 8 & 16 bit days, and some other random retro related games. David Braben (“Elite”, “Virus”, “Frontier”) “LostWinds” “LostWinds 2: Winter of the Melodias” Site: Frontier Developments Twitter: DavidBraben Charles Cecil (Revolution Software) “Beneath a Steel Sky: Remastered” “Broken Sword: Director’s Cut” “Broken Sword - The Smoking Mirror: Remastered” Peter Harrap (“Monty Mole”) “Z” (iOS port of the Bitmap Brothers game) Site: harrap.
